house_listing.house_description: This home built in 1980 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) . Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include patio, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Great Room,Microwave, Storage Space, Tennis Court(s)
